description: Assign ball surface properties used in contact models. Properties are surface conditions (e.g., stiffness, friction) distinct from ball attributes (position, velocity). Property names depend on the active contact model. See Contact Models documentation for available properties per model.

examples.description: Set normal and shear stiffness (linear contact model)
Set friction coefficient for all balls
Set parallel bond properties (linear parallel bond model) for specific group
Set Hertz normal stiffness for balls 1-100

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: Ball.set_prop(property_name, value) - requires iteration: for b in itasca.ball.list(): b.set_prop('kn', 1e8)
